events.title: 2022 NFL Draft
events.description:
The National Football League Draft, also called the NFL Draft or (officially) the Player Selection Meeting, is an annual event which serves as the league's most common source of player recruitment. Each team is given a position in the drafting order in reverse order relative to its record in the previous year, which means that the last place team is positioned first and the Super Bowl champion is last. From this position, the team can either select a player or trade its position to another team for other draft positions, a player or players, or any combination thereof. The round is complete when each team has either selected a player or traded its position in the draft. The first draft was held in 1936, and has been held every year since.

The 2022 NFL Draft, the 87th edition of the National Football League's annual draft, is scheduled to be held April 28–30, 2022, at Caesars Forum on the Las Vegas Strip, in Paradise, Nevada.

question: Boxing: Katie Taylor vs. Amanda Serrano
description:
Katie Taylor will be defending her title as the Undisputed Lightweight Champion of the World against Amanda Serrano in a fight scheduled to take place at Madison Square Garden in New York City, on April 30, 2022, at 10:30 PM ET.

question: Will ApeCoin (APE) reach $30 by May 6?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the price of ApeCoin (APE) is $30.00 or above at any point within the market time frame as per Coingecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/apecoin), and “No” otherwise. 

The market time frame spans from April 27 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET) to May 6 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET). The final candle to be counted will be the one titled "Sat 7 May 2022, 00:00:00". To resolve this market, Coingecko's 30min candlestick high prices will be used.

question: Will TWTR be delisted from the NYSE by December 30?
description:
Twitter, Inc. recently accepted an offer made by Elon Musk to purchase the company. Musk's stated intention is to take Twitter private. If or when this transaction finalizes, Twitter stock will no longer be listed on the New York Stock Exchange.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Twitter (TWTR) is delisted from the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) by December 30, 2022, 4 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Announcements that TWTR will be delisted will not suffice; the delisting of TWTR must be in effect by the resolution date.The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the NYSE (e.g. https://www.nyse.com/quote/XNYS:TWTR/QUOTE, https://twitter.com/NYSE, etc.), however other credible reporting may be used.

events.title: Will TWTR be delisted from the NYSE..?
events.description: This is a market group on when TWTR will be delisted from the NYSE.
